attributes.action: Get Members of Parliament individually and collectively to lead by example on CO2 reduction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parliament & MPs should now start to lead by personal example on carbon reduction using, for example, the following measures.
1. Publish the CO2 footprint of Parliament/MPs, and set objectives for reduction, and measure and report
2. Stop using vehicles in VED bands F/G
3. Stop using non-scheduled flights
4. Pay air passenger duty out of own pockets, not expenses
